participant_1.name: Liam Carter
participant_1.personality: Passionate and determined, he often expresses his dreams with enthusiasm but sometimes feels discouraged by his surroundings.
participant_1.background: i am a musician and hope to make it big some day. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents are not very supportive of my dream.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and practical, she finds joy in her work and shares a deep bond with her pets, often using humor to lighten up her day.
participant_2.background: my cats are very special to me. i'm a construction worker. i enjoy building houses. i have 5 cats. my dad taught me everything i know.
